name: Homebrew-recipes
tagline: A collection of Beers and Meads that I have made and documented.
body:
### Welcome to Tom's Beers

1. IPazA IPA 7.5%
2. Necromancer Strong English Ale 8.5%
3. Mr. Jack English Ale 4.5%
4. Sitra Pale Ale 6.3%
5. <Unnamed> Strong English Ale ?
6. Yami?  Imperial Chocolate Porter ~7.5-8.5%

## Mead

1. Mead-WLP001 ~3% Raw Orange Blossom Honey (1KG) 9L water
2. Mead-WLP051 ~5.6% Raw Orange Blossom Honey (1KG) 7L water
3. Mead-WLP051 Raw Carob (500g) and Raw Wild Lavender Honey (1KG)
  - OG: 1.060
  - Estimated-FG: 0.98
  - FG:
  - Estimated-ABV: 8.1%
  - ABV:
